items.title: Awesome Ai in Finance Updates on Jun 10 - Jun 16, 2024
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jun 10 - Jun 16, 2024
items.content_text:
### LLMs

*   üåüüåü [Financial Statement Analysis with Large Language Models](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4835311) - GPT-4 can outperform professional financial analysts in predicting future earnings changes, generating useful narrative insights, and resulting in superior trading strategies with higher Sharpe ratios and alphas, thereby suggesting a potential central role for LLMs in financial decision-making.
items.content_html:
LLMs

  • üåüüåü Financial Statement Analysis with Large Language Models - GPT-4 can outperform professional financial analysts in predicting future earnings changes, generating useful narrative insights, and resulting in superior trading strategies with higher Sharpe ratios and alphas, thereby suggesting a potential central role for LLMs in financial decision-making.

items.title: Awesome Ai in Finance Updates on Sep 11 - Sep 17, 2023
items.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Sep 11 - Sep 17, 2023
items.content_text:
### LLMs

*   [Hands-on LLMs: Train and Deploy a Real-time Financial Advisor (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/iusztinpaul/hands-on-llms) - Train and deploy a real-time financial advisor chatbot with Falcon 7B and CometLLM.

### Courses & Books & Blogs

*   [MLSys-NYU-2022 (‚≠ê492)](https://github.com/jacopotagliabue/MLSys-NYU-2022/tree/main) - Slides, scripts and materials for the Machine Learning in Finance course at NYU Tandon, 2022.
*   [Train and Deploy a Serverless API to predict crypto prices (‚≠ê837)](https://github.com/Paulescu/hands-on-train-and-deploy-ml) - In this tutorial you won't build an ML system that will make you rich. But you will master the MLOps frameworks and tools you need to build ML systems that, together with tons of experimentation, can take you there.
items.content_html:
LLMs

  • Hands-on LLMs: Train and Deploy a Real-time Financial Advisor (‚≠ê3.3k) - Train and deploy a real-time financial advisor chatbot with Falcon 7B and CometLLM.

Courses & Books & Blogs

  • MLSys-NYU-2022 (‚≠ê492) - Slides, scripts and materials for the Machine Learning in Finance course at NYU Tandon, 2022.
  • Train and Deploy a Serverless API to predict crypto prices (‚≠ê837) - In this tutorial you won't build an ML system that will make you rich. But you will master the MLOps frameworks and tools you need to build ML systems that, together with tons of experimentation, can take you there.

items.title: Awesome Ai in Finance Updates on Aug 03 - Aug 09, 2020
items.summary: 50 awesome projects updated on Aug 03 - Aug 09, 2020
items.content_text:
### Papers

*   [An Investigation into the Use of Reinforcement Learning Techniques within the Algorithmic Trading Domain, 2015](http://www.doc.ic.ac.uk/teaching/distinguished-projects/2015/j.cumming.pdf)
*   [Reinforcement Learning for Trading, 1994](http://papers.nips.cc/paper/1551-reinforcement-learning-for-trading.pdf)
*   [Ten Financial Applications of Machine Learning, 2018](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3197726) - Slides review few important financial ML applications.

### Courses & Books & Blogs

*   [Advanced-Deep-Trading (‚≠ê555)](https://github.com/Rachnog/Advanced-Deep-Trading) - Experiments based on "Advances in financial machine learning" book.

### Event Drive

*   üåüüåü [stockpredictionai (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/borisbanushev/stockpredictionai) - Complete process for predicting stock price movements.

### Time Series Data

*   [tf\_deep\_rl\_trader (‚≠ê253)](https://github.com/miroblog/tf_deep_rl_trader) - Trading environment(OpenAI Gym) + PPO(TensorForce).
*   [trading-gym (‚≠ê232)](https://github.com/6-Billionaires/trading-gym) - Trading agent to train with episode of short term trading itself.
*   [deep\_rl\_trader (‚≠ê419)](https://github.com/miroblog/deep_rl_trader) - Trading environment(OpenAI Gym) + DDQN (Keras-RL).
*   [DeepLearningNotes (‚≠ê373)](https://github.com/AlphaSmartDog/DeepLearningNotes) - Machine learning in quant analysis.
*   [stock\_market\_reinforcement\_learning (‚≠ê801)](https://github.com/kh-kim/stock_market_reinforcement_learning) - Stock market trading OpenAI Gym environment with Deep Reinforcement Learning using Keras.

### Portfolio Management

*   [Deep-Reinforcement-Stock-Trading (‚≠ê668)](https://github.com/Albert-Z-Guo/Deep-Reinforcement-Stock-Trading) - A light-weight deep reinforcement learning framework for portfolio management.
*   [qtrader (‚≠ê472)](https://github.com/filangel/qtrader) - Reinforcement Learning for portfolio management.
*   [PGPortfolio (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/ZhengyaoJiang/PGPortfolio) - A Deep Reinforcement Learning framework for the financial portfolio management problem.

### High Frequency Trading

*   üåü [SGX-Full-OrderBook-Tick-Data-Trading-Strategy (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/rorysroes/SGX-Full-OrderBook-Tick-Data-Trading-Strategy) - Solutions for high-frequency trading (HFT) strategies using data science approaches (Machine Learning) on Full Orderbook Tick Data.

### Crypto Currencies Strategies

*   [LSTM-Crypto-Price-Prediction (‚≠ê329)](https://github.com/SC4RECOIN/LSTM-Crypto-Price-Prediction) - Predicting price trends in crypto markets using an LSTM-RNN for trading.
*   [tforce\_btc\_trader (‚≠ê831)](https://github.com/lefnire/tforce_btc_trader) - TensorForce Bitcoin trading bot.
*   [Tensorflow-NeuroEvolution-Trading-Bot (‚≠ê161)](https://github.com/SC4RECOIN/Tensorflow-NeuroEvolution-Trading-Bot) - A population model that trade cyrpto and breed and mutate iteratively.
*   [gekkoga (‚≠ê312)](https://github.com/gekkowarez/gekkoga) - Genetic algorithm for solving optimization of trading strategies using Gekko.
*   [bitcoin\_prediction (‚≠ê233)](https://github.com/llSourcell/bitcoin_prediction) - Code for "Bitcoin Prediction" by Siraj Raval on YouTube.

### Technical Analysis

*   [gekko\_trading\_stuff (‚≠ê110)](https://github.com/thegamecat/gekko-trading-stuff) - Awesome crypto currency trading platform.
*   [Bitcoin\_MACD\_Strategy (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/VermeirJellen/Bitcoin_MACD_Strategy) - Bitcoin MACD crossover trading strategy backtest.
*   [crypto-signal (‚≠ê5.2k)](https://github.com/CryptoSignal/crypto-signal) - Automated crypto trading & technical analysis (TA) bot for Bittrex, Binance, GDAX, and more.

### Arbitrage

*   [r2 (‚≠ê810)](https://github.com/bitrinjani/r2) - Automatic arbitrage trading system powered by Node.js + TypeScript.
*   [cryptocurrency-arbitrage (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/manu354/cryptocurrency-arbitrage) - A crypto currency arbitrage opportunity calculator. Over 800 currencies and 50 markets.
*   [bitcoin-arbitrage (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/maxme/bitcoin-arbitrage) - Bitcoin arbitrage opportunity detector.
*   [blackbird](https://github.com/butor/blackbird) - Long / short market-neutral strategy.

### Data Sources / Traditional Markets

*   üåü [Quandl](https://www.quandl.com/tools/api) - Get millions of financial and economic dataset from hundreds of publishers via a single free API.
*   [Tushare (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/waditu/tushare) - Crawling historical data of Chinese stocks.

### Data Sources / Crypto Currencies

*   [CryptoInscriber (‚≠ê51)](https://github.com/Optixal/CryptoInscriber) - A live crypto currency historical trade data blotter. Download live historical trade data from any crypto exchange.
*   [Gekko-Datasets (‚≠ê173)](https://github.com/xFFFFF/Gekko-Datasets) - Gekko trading bot dataset dumps. Download and use history files in SQLite format.

### Research Tools / Crypto Currencies

*   üåüüåü [TensorTrade (‚≠ê5.2k)](https://github.com/tensortrade-org/tensortrade) - Trade efficiently with reinforcement learning.
*   [JAQS (‚≠ê628)](https://github.com/quantOS-org/JAQS) - An open source quant strategies research platform.
*   [empyrical (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/quantopian/empyrical) - Common financial risk and performance metrics. Used by Zipline and pyfolio.

### Traditional Market / Crypto Currencies

*   üåüüåü [zipline (‚≠ê19k)](https://github.com/quantopian/zipline) - A python algorithmic trading library.
*   [rqalpha (‚≠ê5.8k)](https://github.com/ricequant/rqalpha) - A extendable, replaceable Python algorithmic backtest & trading framework.
*   [backtrader (‚≠ê18k)](https://github.com/backtrader/backtrader) - Python backtesting library for trading strategies.
*   [kungfu (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/taurusai/kungfu) - Kungfu Master trading system.

### Crypto Currencies / Plugins

*   [CoinMarketCapBacktesting (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/JimmyWuMadchester/CoinMarketCapBacktesting) - Tests bt and Quantopian Zipline as backtesting frameworks for coin trading strategy.
*   [Gekko-BacktestTool (‚≠ê231)](https://github.com/xFFFFF/Gekko-BacktestTool) - Batch backtest, import and strategy params optimalization for Gekko Trading Bot.

### Crypto Currencies / Crypto Currencies

*   [zenbot (‚≠ê8.3k)](https://github.com/DeviaVir/zenbot) - Command-line crypto currency trading bot using Node.js and MongoDB.
*   [bot18 (‚≠ê199)](https://github.com/carlos8f/bot18) - High-frequency crypto currency trading bot developed by Zenbot.
*   [magic8bot (‚≠ê377)](https://github.com/magic8bot/magic8bot) - Crypto currency trading bot using Node.js and MongoDB.
*   [catalyst (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/enigmampc/catalyst) - An algorithmic trading library for Crypto-Assets in python.
*   [MACD](https://github.com/sudoscripter/MACD) - Zenbot MACD Auto-Trader.

### TA Lib / Plugins

*   [tulipnode (‚≠ê508)](https://github.com/TulipCharts/tulipnode) - Official Node.js wrapper for Tulip Indicators. Provides over 100 technical analysis overlay and indicator functions.

### Exchange API / Plugins

*   [HuobiFeeder (‚≠ê39)](https://github.com/mmmaaaggg/HuobiFeeder) - Connect HUOBIPRO exchange, get market/historical data for ABAT trading platform backtest analysis and live trading.

### GYM Environment / Plugins

*   üåü [TradingGym (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/Yvictor/TradingGym) - Trading and Backtesting environment for training reinforcement learning agent.
*   [TradzQAI (‚≠ê165)](https://github.com/kkuette/TradzQAI) - Trading environment for RL agents, backtesting and training.

### Others / Plugins

*   [zipline-tensorboard (‚≠ê107)](https://github.com/jimgoo/zipline-tensorboard) - TensorBoard as a Zipline dashboard.

### Others / Other Resource

*   üåü [Awesome-Quant-Machine-Learning-Trading (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/grananqvist/Awesome-Quant-Machine-Learning-Trading) - Quant / Algorithm trading resources with an emphasis on Machine Learning.
items.content_html:
Papers

  • An Investigation into the Use of Reinforcement Learning Techniques within the Algorithmic Trading Domain, 2015
  • Reinforcement Learning for Trading, 1994
  • Ten Financial Applications of Machine Learning, 2018 - Slides review few important financial ML applications.

Courses & Books & Blogs

  • Advanced-Deep-Trading (‚≠ê555) - Experiments based on "Advances in financial machine learning" book.

Event Drive

  • üåüüåü stockpredictionai (‚≠ê4.8k) - Complete process for predicting stock price movements.

Time Series Data

  • tf_deep_rl_trader (‚≠ê253) - Trading environment(OpenAI Gym) + PPO(TensorForce).
  • trading-gym (‚≠ê232) - Trading agent to train with episode of short term trading itself.
  • deep_rl_trader (‚≠ê419) - Trading environment(OpenAI Gym) + DDQN (Keras-RL).
  • DeepLearningNotes (‚≠ê373) - Machine learning in quant analysis.
  • stock_market_reinforcement_learning (‚≠ê801) - Stock market trading OpenAI Gym environment with Deep Reinforcement Learning using Keras.

Portfolio Management

  • Deep-Reinforcement-Stock-Trading (‚≠ê668) - A light-weight deep reinforcement learning framework for portfolio management.
  • qtrader (‚≠ê472) - Reinforcement Learning for portfolio management.
  • PGPortfolio (‚≠ê1.8k) - A Deep Reinforcement Learning framework for the financial portfolio management problem.

High Frequency Trading

  • üåü SGX-Full-OrderBook-Tick-Data-Trading-Strategy (‚≠ê2.1k) - Solutions for high-frequency trading (HFT) strategies using data science approaches (Machine Learning) on Full Orderbook Tick Data.

Crypto Currencies Strategies

  • LSTM-Crypto-Price-Prediction (‚≠ê329) - Predicting price trends in crypto markets using an LSTM-RNN for trading.
  • tforce_btc_trader (‚≠ê831) - TensorForce Bitcoin trading bot.
  • Tensorflow-NeuroEvolution-Trading-Bot (‚≠ê161) - A population model that trade cyrpto and breed and mutate iteratively.
  • gekkoga (‚≠ê312) - Genetic algorithm for solving optimization of trading strategies using Gekko.
  • bitcoin_prediction (‚≠ê233) - Code for "Bitcoin Prediction" by Siraj Raval on YouTube.

Technical Analysis

  • gekko_trading_stuff (‚≠ê110) - Awesome crypto currency trading platform.
  • Bitcoin_MACD_Strategy (‚≠ê9) - Bitcoin MACD crossover trading strategy backtest.
  • crypto-signal (‚≠ê5.2k) - Automated crypto trading & technical analysis (TA) bot for Bittrex, Binance, GDAX, and more.

Arbitrage

  • r2 (‚≠ê810) - Automatic arbitrage trading system powered by Node.js + TypeScript.
  • cryptocurrency-arbitrage (‚≠ê1.3k) - A crypto currency arbitrage opportunity calculator. Over 800 currencies and 50 markets.
  • bitcoin-arbitrage (‚≠ê2.5k) - Bitcoin arbitrage opportunity detector.
  • blackbird - Long / short market-neutral strategy.

Data Sources / Traditional Markets

  • üåü Quandl - Get millions of financial and economic dataset from hundreds of publishers via a single free API.
  • Tushare (‚≠ê14k) - Crawling historical data of Chinese stocks.

Data Sources / Crypto Currencies

  • CryptoInscriber (‚≠ê51) - A live crypto currency historical trade data blotter. Download live historical trade data from any crypto exchange.
  • Gekko-Datasets (‚≠ê173) - Gekko trading bot dataset dumps. Download and use history files in SQLite format.

Research Tools / Crypto Currencies

  • üåüüåü TensorTrade (‚≠ê5.2k) - Trade efficiently with reinforcement learning.
  • JAQS (‚≠ê628) - An open source quant strategies research platform.
  • empyrical (‚≠ê1.4k) - Common financial risk and performance metrics. Used by Zipline and pyfolio.

Traditional Market / Crypto Currencies

  • üåüüåü zipline (‚≠ê19k) - A python algorithmic trading library.
  • rqalpha (‚≠ê5.8k) - A extendable, replaceable Python algorithmic backtest & trading framework.
  • backtrader (‚≠ê18k) - Python backtesting library for trading strategies.
  • kungfu (‚≠ê3.6k) - Kungfu Master trading system.

Crypto Currencies / Plugins

Crypto Currencies / Crypto Currencies

  • bot18 (‚≠ê199) - High-frequency crypto currency trading bot developed by Zenbot.
  • magic8bot (‚≠ê377) - Crypto currency trading bot using Node.js and MongoDB.
  • catalyst (‚≠ê2.5k) - An algorithmic trading library for Crypto-Assets in python.
  • MACD - Zenbot MACD Auto-Trader.

TA Lib / Plugins

  • tulipnode (‚≠ê508) - Official Node.js wrapper for Tulip Indicators. Provides over 100 technical analysis overlay and indicator functions.

Exchange API / Plugins

  • HuobiFeeder (‚≠ê39) - Connect HUOBIPRO exchange, get market/historical data for ABAT trading platform backtest analysis and live trading.

GYM Environment / Plugins

  • üåü TradingGym (‚≠ê1.7k) - Trading and Backtesting environment for training reinforcement learning agent.

items.title: Awesome Ai in Finance Updates on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2020
items.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2020
items.content_text:
### Papers

*   [The Theory of Speculation L. Bachelier, 1900](http://www.radio.goldseek.com/bachelier-thesis-theory-of-speculation-en.pdf) - The influences which determine the movements of the Stock Exchange are.
*   [Brownian Motion in the Stock Market Osborne, 1959](http://m.e-m-h.org/Osbo59.pdf) - The common-stock prices can be regarded as an ensemble of decisions in statistical equilibrium.
*   [Dragon-Kings, Black Swans and the Prediction of Crises Didier Sornette](https://arxiv.org/pdf/0907.4290.pdf) - The power laws in the distributions of event sizes under a broad range of conditions in a large variety of systems.
*   [Financial Trading as a Game: A Deep Reinforcement Learning Approach](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1807.02787.pdf) - Deep reinforcement learning provides a framework toward end-to-end training of such trading agent.
*   [Machine Learning for Trading](https://cims.nyu.edu/~ritter/ritter2017machine.pdf) - With an appropriate choice of the reward function, reinforcement learning techniques can successfully handle the risk-averse case.

### Courses & Books & Blogs

*   [Advances in Financial Machine Learning](https://www.amazon.com/Advances-Financial-Machine-Learning-Marcos-ebook/dp/B079KLDW21/ref=sr_1_1?s=books\&ie=UTF8\&qid=1541717436\&sr=1-1) - Using advanced ML solutions to overcome real-world investment problems.

### Time Series Data

*   üåü [Personae (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/Ceruleanacg/Personae) - Implements and environment of Deep Reinforcement Learning & Supervised Learning for Quantitative Trading.

### Articles / Plugins

*   [The-Economist (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/nailperry-zd/The-Economist) - The Economist.

  • Dragon-Kings, Black Swans and the Prediction of Crises Didier Sornette - The power laws in the distributions of event sizes under a broad range of conditions in a large variety of systems.
  • Financial Trading as a Game: A Deep Reinforcement Learning Approach - Deep reinforcement learning provides a framework toward end-to-end training of such trading agent.
  • Machine Learning for Trading - With an appropriate choice of the reward function, reinforcement learning techniques can successfully handle the risk-averse case.

items.title: Awesome Ai in Finance Updates on Jul 20 - Jul 26, 2020
items.summary: 41 awesome projects updated on Jul 20 - Jul 26, 2020
items.content_text:
### Papers

*   [A Deep Reinforcement Learning Framework for the Financial Portfolio Management Problem](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1706.10059.pdf)

### Courses & Books & Blogs

*   [AI in Finance](https://cfte.education/) - Learn Fintech Online.

### Time Series Data

*   [trading-rl (‚≠ê222)](https://github.com/Kostis-S-Z/trading-rl) - Deep Reinforcement Learning for Financial Trading using Price Trailing.
*   [gym-trading (‚≠ê713)](https://github.com/hackthemarket/gym-trading) - Environment for reinforcement-learning algorithmic trading models.
*   [zenbrain (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/carlos8f/zenbrain) - A framework for machine-learning bots.

### Portfolio Management

*   [DeepDow (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/jankrepl/deepdow) - Portfolio optimization with deep learning.

### High Frequency Trading

*   [HFT\_Bitcoin (‚≠ê156)](https://github.com/ghgr/HFT_Bitcoin) - Analysis of High Frequency Trading on Bitcoin exchanges.

### Event Drive

*   üåü [trump2cash (‚≠ê6.4k)](https://github.com/maxbbraun/trump2cash) - A stock trading bot powered by Trump tweets.

### Crypto Currencies Strategies

*   [Gekko\_ANN\_Strategies (‚≠ê55)](https://github.com/markchen8717/Gekko_ANN_Strategies) - ANN trading strategies for the Gekko trading bot.
*   [gekko-neuralnet (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/zschro/gekko-neuralnet) - Neural network strategy for Gekko.

### Technical Analysis

*   [quant-trading (‚≠ê7.6k)](https://github.com/je-suis-tm/quant-trading) - Python quantitative trading strategies.
*   [Gekko-Bot-Resources (‚≠ê197)](https://github.com/cloggy45/Gekko-Bot-Resources) - Gekko bot resources.
*   [gekko\_tools (‚≠ê144)](https://github.com/tommiehansen/gekko_tools) - Gekko strategies, tools etc.
*   [gekko RSI\_WR (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/zzmike76/gekko) - Gekko RSI\_WR strategies.
*   [gekko HL (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/mounirlabaied/gekko-strat-hl) - Calculate down peak and trade on.
*   [EthTradingAlgorithm (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/Philipid3s/EthTradingAlgorithm) - Ethereum trading algorithm using Python 3.5 and the library ZipLine.
*   [forex.analytics (‚≠ê187)](https://github.com/mkmarek/forex.analytics) - Node.js native library performing technical analysis over an OHLC dataset with use of genetic algorithmv.
*   [Gekko-Strategies (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/xFFFFF/Gekko-Strategies) - Strategies to Gekko trading bot with backtests results and some useful tools.
*   [gekko-gannswing (‚≠ê70)](https://github.com/johndoe75/gekko-gannswing) - Gann's Swing trade strategy for Gekko trade bot.

### Lottery & Gamble

*   [LotteryPredict (‚≠ê393)](https://github.com/chengstone/LotteryPredict) - Use LSTM to predict lottery.

### Arbitrage

*   [ArbitrageBot (‚≠ê175)](https://github.com/BatuhanUsluel/ArbitrageBot) - Arbitrage bot that currently works on bittrex & poloniex.

### Data Sources / Traditional Markets

*   [yahoo-finance (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/lukaszbanasiak/yahoo-finance) - Python module to get stock data from Yahoo! Finance.

### Research Tools / Crypto Currencies

*   [pyfolio (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/quantopian/pyfolio) - Portfolio and risk analytics in Python.
*   [alphalens (‚≠ê3.8k)](https://github.com/quantopian/alphalens) - Performance analysis of predictive (alpha) stock factors.
*   [zvt (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/zvtvz/zvt) - Zero vector trader.

### Traditional Market / Crypto Currencies

*   üåü [TradingView](http://tradingview.com/) - Get real-time information and market insights.
*   [pylivetrader (‚≠ê671)](https://github.com/alpacahq/pylivetrader) - Python live trade execution library with zipline interface.

### Crypto Currencies / Crypto Currencies

*   [QuantResearchDev (‚≠ê30)](https://github.com/mounirlabaied/QuantResearchDev) - Quant Research dev & Traders open source project.
*   [abu (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/bbfamily/abu) - A quant trading system base on python.

### TA Lib / Plugins

*   [pandas\_talib (‚≠ê769)](https://github.com/femtotrader/pandas_talib) - A Python Pandas implementation of technical analysis indicators.
*   [finta (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/peerchemist/finta) - Common financial technical indicators implemented in Python-Pandas (70+ indicators).
*   [techan.js (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/andredumas/techan.js) - A visual, technical analysis and charting (Candlestick, OHLC, indicators) library built on D3.

### Exchange API / Plugins

*   [IbPy (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/blampe/IbPy) - Python API for the Interactive Brokers on-line trading system.
*   [ctpwrapper (‚≠ê519)](https://github.com/nooperpudd/ctpwrapper) - Shanghai future exchange CTP api.

### Framework / Plugins

*   [tf-quant-finance (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/google/tf-quant-finance) - High-performance TensorFlow library for quantitative finance.

### Visualizing / Plugins

*   [playground (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/tensorflow/playground) - Play with neural networks.
*   [netron (‚≠ê31k)](https://github.com/lutzroeder/netron) - Visualizer for deep learning and machine learning models.

### GYM Environment / Plugins

*   [btgym (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/Kismuz/btgym) - Scalable, event-driven, deep-learning-friendly backtesting library.

### Articles / Plugins

*   [nyu-mlif-notes (‚≠ê96)](https://github.com/wizardforcel/nyu-mlif-notes) - NYU machine learning in finance notes.

### Others / Plugins

*   [gekko-quasar-ui (‚≠ê112)](https://github.com/H256/gekko-quasar-ui) - An UI port for gekko trading bot using Quasar framework.

### Others / Other Resource

*   [awesome-quant (‚≠ê21k)](https://github.com/wilsonfreitas/awesome-quant) - A curated list of insanely awesome libraries, packages and resources for Quants (Quantitative Finance).
